name: Dell Series
description: The Laptop is compact with its 6.2-inch OLED screen and far lighter at 168g. It perfectly captures the design, looks, and feel of the expensive one. It comes with a snapdragon processor with a 5n chip in it. It has a 200mp camera in the rear 100mp in front perfect for selfie lovers. It also support HDR content means you can watch 4K content on it.

name: samsung s20
description: Show off your vibrant and exotic taste with this Flower Lady Portrait Art, featuring an array of lush tones and metallic gold detailing. Depicting an elegant lady posed against a leafy green and golden backdrop with intricately patterned clothing and a floral headdress, this artwork will look beautiful and striking on any wall.

name: Dell Series
description: this portrait of Robert Downey Jr. is drawn freehand in Photoshop using layer blending modes to simulate the effect of transparent watercolor.
